subject: Baseball
Javits, Jacob K, Convention Center (NYC)
Trade Shows and Fairs
lead_paragraph: Fanfest, a sprawling baseball extravaganza that filled two levels of the Javits Convention Center in Manhattan, is kicking off the All-Star festivities.
snippet: Fanfest, a sprawling baseball extravaganza that filled two levels of the Javits Convention Center in Manhattan, is kicking off the All-Star festivities.
